message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset.  I'm confident it will be a significant benefit to your business. My asking price for this product is $1750000. I'm open to discussing the price further, but I'm firm on the value it represents.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1400000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you mentioned it represents.

Bob, I understand your position and appreciate your counteroffer. However, $1400000 doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product.  To bridge the gap, I'm willing to come down to $1600000. This price still allows for a fair return on my investment and recognizes the benefits you'll gain.

Thank you for considering my previous offer and coming down to $1600000. I'm still a bit concerned about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering $1520000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you mentioned it represents.
